abstract: A source said that the French supermarket retailer was in advanced talks to replace its chief executive, Lars Olofsson.
snippet: A source said that the French supermarket retailer was in advanced talks to replace its chief executive, Lars Olofsson.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Carrefour, the French retailer that ranks second in the world in revenue behind Wal-Mart Stores, was in advanced talks to replace its chief executive, people with direct knowledge of the situation said Thursday.

headline.main: Carrefour Said to Seek Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: Carrefour Is Said to Seek Chief Executive
